review: i think this movie is underrated. harman and priyanka were absolutely great in terms of acting. priyanka did very good in her each character. storyline was great and intriguing. they kept suspense very well till the end. of course screen time is very long and songs in every 15 min interval may irritate sometimes but overall it is a great movie to watch. fresh script, nice portrayal of characters.... it's a treat to watch. do not miss this movie.

i think movie had unique story it's very emotional, confusion, interesting ,cute,funny ,romantic story at the same time.it will get better if add more graphic quality and presentation but i love pr,iyanka acting in this movie i think she do great work in this movie ,she is like soul to this movie very touching and family friendly movie you should really give time to this .

one of the most underrated bollywood romcoms!it is the modern day musical,anthology movie,romcom all rolled in one.priyanka chopra gave superb performance(s) and should have won awards for this.harman baweja was also good.the music was superb throughout.do watch it if you can..

i think this is the best movie i have ever seen.  contains all the emotions. great acting by harman baweja and the pretty priyanka chopra.
loved the movie.
quite an entertainer.

people need to appreciate the hard work and dedication of the moviemakers of this movie. thank god for this movie's existence, i really love the performance of harman and priyanka.. also all songs are so beautifully written and composed.
